remarks: Demonstration of ring homomorphism.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Mar-2015.)
statement:
isrhmd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
isrhmd.o $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
isrhmd.n $e |- N = ( 1r ` S ) $.
isrhmd.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
isrhmd.u $e |- .X. = ( .r ` S ) $.
isrhmd.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
isrhmd.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. Ring ) $.
isrhmd.ho $e |- ( ph -> ( F ` .1. ) = N ) $.
isrhmd.ht $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( F ` ( x .x. y ) ) = ( ( F ` x ) .X. ( F ` y ) ) ) $.
isrhmd.c $e |- C = ( Base ` S ) $.
isrhmd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) $.
isrhmd.q $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` S ) $.
isrhmd.f $e |- ( ph -> F : B --> C ) $.
isrhmd.hp $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( F ` ( x .+ y ) ) = ( ( F ` x ) .+^ ( F ` y ) ) ) $.
isrhmd $p |- ( ph -> F e. ( R RingHom S ) ) $.
$d .+ x y $.
$d .+^ x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d ph x y $.
